4. If you didn't have compatible LSEG device, request an AWS Workspace V2 

[https://devportal.lseg.com/create/templates/default/dxone-desktop-vdi-v2](https://devportal.lseg.com/create/templates/default/dxone-desktop-vdi-v2)

  Notes: VDI Operating System (OS) * MUST select "Ubuntu", currently only Ubuntu OS with firefox can acess the AI Platform successfully.

5. waiting for about 0.5 hour, until you receive an email, subject is "AWS V2 Workspace has been provisioned"

6. download the Ubuntu V2 Workspace by       [https://lsegroup.sharepoint.com/sites/DXD/SitePages/Welcome-to-DXD-v2-Windows-Workspace.aspx](https://lsegroup.sharepoint.com/sites/DXD/SitePages/Welcome-to-DXD-v2-Windows-Workspace.aspx?%3D%3D&sdata=VmJJMTAvbGtuK1o3MXA5Y2czWURPM1FFSmZic3JzWWkwbEtKUUluSkRTZz0%3D&ovuser=287e9f0e-91ec-4cf0-b7a4-c63898072181%2CHaiyang.Wang%40lseg.com)

7. login to the workspace

YourAWS V2 workspace has been automatically provisioned.

To log in into your workspace please use the following credentials:

Username - hwang4

Registration code - SLiad+W45BS5

Password - your **LSEG** password

The Microsoft Authenticator code. ( Do not use RSA Token )

To begin setup, please click on the following link [Visit
FAQ Page](https://lsegroup.sharepoint.com/sites/DXD/SitePages/Welcome-to-DXD-v2-Windows-Workspace.aspx) to start installing the client software. If you have any questionsabout **software installation** or require additional assistance, pleaserefer to information on the page above.
